Adds or subtracts 1 from the day value.
@1,2@ Performs {{c|1=*this += std::chrono::days{1};}}.
@3,4@ Performs {{c|1=*this -= std::chrono::days{1};}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1,3@ A reference to this {{tt|day}} after modification.
@2,4@ A copy of the {{tt|day}} made before modification.

===Notes===
If the result would be outside the range {{closed range|0|255}}, the actual stored value is unspecified.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;chrono&gt;

int main()
{
    std::chrono::day d{15};
    
    ++d;
    assert(d == std::chrono::day(16));

    --d;
    assert(d == std::chrono::day(15));
}
}}
